title: CFB Preview and the Alliance With Bruce Feldman. Plus NFL QBs as NBA Players, Ryen's Trip Abroad, and Life Advice
description:
Russillo pairs NFL QBs to their NBA career doppelgängers (0:55) before talking with The Athletic's Bruce Feldman about the ACC, Big Ten, and Pac-12's alliance announcement and previewing the top 10 teams in the AP rankings (16:30). Then Ryen shares some highlights from his vacation to Switzerland (1:02:00) before answering some listener-submitted Life Advice questions (1:27:05).

Host: Ryen Russillo
Guest: Bruce Feldman
Producers: Kyle Crichton and Steve Ceruti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
